metadata.title: CVE-2022-37598 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: ** DISPUTED ** Prototype pollution vulnerability in function DEFNODE inast.js in mishoo UglifyJS 3.13.2 via the name variable in ast.js. NOTE: thevendor considers this an invalid report.

criterions.comment: uglifyjs: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
